(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ good)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB know)
              (SBAR (IN that)
                (S
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT some))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ enterprising) (NNS hawkers))))
                  (VP
                    (VP (VBP have)
                      (VP (VBN taken)
                        (PP (IN on)
                          (NP (DT the) (JJ Japanese) (NNP Ramen) (NN concept)))))
                    (CC and)
                    (VP (VBD brought)
                      (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ own) (NNP Mee) (NNP Pok) (NN Tar))
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (NP (DT the) (JJ next) (NN level))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(good-3, It-1)
cop(good-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, good-3)
aux(know-5, to-4)
xcomp(good-3, know-5)
mark(taken-13, that-6)
nsubj(taken-13, some-7)
prep(some-7, of-8)
poss(hawkers-11, our-9)
amod(hawkers-11, enterprising-10)
pobj(of-8, hawkers-11)
aux(taken-13, have-12)
ccomp(know-5, taken-13)
prep(taken-13, on-14)
det(concept-18, the-15)
amod(concept-18, Japanese-16)
nn(concept-18, Ramen-17)
pobj(on-14, concept-18)
cc(taken-13, and-19)
conj(taken-13, brought-20)
poss(Tar-25, our-21)
amod(Tar-25, own-22)
nn(Tar-25, Mee-23)
nn(Tar-25, Pok-24)
dobj(brought-20, Tar-25)
prep(brought-20, to-26)
det(level-29, the-27)
amod(level-29, next-28)
pobj(to-26, level-29)


(ROOT
  (PRN
    (S
      (S
        (NP
          (NP (DT The) (NN idea))
          (PP (IN of)
            (S
              (VP
                (VP (VBG taking)
                  (NP (DT an) (`` ``) (JJ old) (NN signboard) ('' '')))
                (CC and)
                (VP (VBG converting)
                  (NP (PRP it))
                  (PP (TO to)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ standalone) (NN restaurant))))))))
        (VP (VBZ is)
          (ADVP (RB certainly))
          (RB not)
          (ADJP (JJ new))))
      (CC and)
      (S
        (NP (DT some))
        (ADVP (RB well))
        (VP (VBD loved)
          (NP (NNS brands))
          (PP (IN like)
            (NP (NNP Ya) (NNP Kun))))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN crayfish)
      (CC and)
      (NN fish))
    (VP (VBZ slices)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (PRP$ your) (NNP Mee) (NNP Pok))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(slices-4, crayfish-1)
cc(crayfish-1, and-2)
conj(crayfish-1, fish-3)
root(ROOT-0, slices-4)
prep(slices-4, to-5)
poss(Pok-8, your-6)
nn(Pok-8, Mee-7)
pobj(to-5, Pok-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP They))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (VBP sell)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ normal) (NN bowl))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Mee) (NNP Pok))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (NNP $)))))))))

              (, ,))))))))

          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)

    (S

              (VP (VBN added))))))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (NP (NNP Conclusion) (NNP Its))
    (ADJP (JJ good)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB see)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ own) (NNP Mee) (NNP Pok))
              (VP (VBN taken)
                (PP (TO to)
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ next) (NN level))))))))
      (. !))))

root(ROOT-0, Its-2)
dep(Its-2, good-3)
aux(see-5, to-4)
xcomp(good-3, see-5)
poss(Pok-9, our-6)
amod(Pok-9, own-7)
nn(Pok-9, Mee-8)
dobj(see-5, Pok-9)
partmod(Pok-9, taken-10)
prep(taken-10, to-11)
det(level-14, the-12)
amod(level-14, next-13)
pobj(to-11, level-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Ah) (NNP Guan) (NNP Mee) (NNP Pok))
      (VP (VBG dishes)
        (PRT (RP out))
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ great) (NNP Mee) (NNP Pok) (NN experience))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT that))
            (S
              (VP (VBZ goes)
                (PP (IN beyond)
                  (NP
                    (NP (RB just) (DT that) (NN bowl))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NNS noodles)))))
                (PP (IN by)
                  (S
                    (VP (VBG creating)
                      (NP (DT an) (NN environment)
                        (S
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP (VB dine)
                              (PP (IN in)
                                (SBAR
                                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                                  (S
                                    (VP (VBZ is)
                                      (ADJP (JJ modern)))))))))))))))))))
    (ADVP (RB yet))
    (VP (VBZ alludes)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (NN tradition))))
    (. .)))


nn(Pok-4, Ah-1)
nn(Pok-4, Guan-2)
nn(Pok-4, Mee-3)
nsubj(alludes-31, Pok-4)
partmod(Pok-4, dishes-5)
prt(dishes-5, out-6)
det(experience-11, a-7)
amod(experience-11, great-8)
nn(experience-11, Mee-9)
nn(experience-11, Pok-10)
dobj(dishes-5, experience-11)
nsubj(goes-13, that-12)
rcmod(experience-11, goes-13)
prep(goes-13, beyond-14)
advmod(bowl-17, just-15)
det(bowl-17, that-16)
pobj(beyond-14, bowl-17)
prep(bowl-17, of-18)
pobj(of-18, noodles-19)
prep(goes-13, by-20)
pcomp(by-20, creating-21)
det(environment-23, an-22)
dobj(creating-21, environment-23)
aux(dine-25, to-24)
infmod(environment-23, dine-25)
prep(dine-25, in-26)
nsubj(modern-29, which-27)
cop(modern-29, is-28)
pcomp(in-26, modern-29)
advmod(alludes-31, yet-30)
root(ROOT-0, alludes-31)
prep(alludes-31, to-32)
pobj(to-32, tradition-33)
